name: Auron
description: A brilliant, dense and conductive metal.

name: Auroxium Alloy
description: Auron that has been forged into a stronger metal.

name: Azurite
description: A blue gem layered with impurities.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Pyrol and Azurite being rarer than intended and Coprun and Devar being more likely than intended. They should now be equally as likely.

name: Brilliant Eidolon Shard
description: Rare shard gained from capturing the Sentients roaming the Plains of Eidolon. Use it to gain Focus or to unbind Way-bound focus nodes.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.12.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Clients not being able to see/pick up the dropped Brilliant Eidolon Shard when a Host Migration occurred and no one had picked it up yet.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.1.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue where Brilliant Eidolon Shards were not properly accounted for in the Focus Conversion screen after used to unlock Way-Bound nodes.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a UI issue that occurred upon spending Focus while also redeeming Brilliant Eidolon Shards for Focus.

name: Cetus Wisp
description: Strange stone lifeforms that call the Plains home. They are a rare find, clustering together, floating above a patch of ground they've taken an inexplicable interest in. They are an enigma.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.18.7
patchlogs.changes: Quill Onkko has added a Cetus Wisp to his Offerings in Cetus. These can be purchased with Quill Standing for Architect level Tenno.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.16.0
patchlogs.changes: A special UI message is now displayed when picking up a Syndicate Medallion or Cetus Wisp (similar to Argon Crystal).

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Cetus Wisps being updated while the game was paused -- this could lead to them escaping while you answered the phone.

name: Condroc Wing
description: The talon on a condroc's wing is is sharp enough to tear through bone.

name: Coprite Alloy
description: Coprun that has been forged into a stronger metal.

name: Coprun
description: A soft, malleable metal.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Pyrol and Azurite being rarer than intended and Coprun and Devar being more likely than intended. They should now be equally as likely.

name: Corpus Cipher
description: A cipher used to decode Corpus intel. Crafting component required to create a CORPUS VOID KEY

name: Corpus Datamass
description: A Corpus datamass containing encrypted intel. Crafting component required to create a CORPUS VOID KEY

name: Crimzian
description: A blood-red gem.

name: Detonite Ampule
description: Researching the Detonite traces within could advance our weapon technology.

name: Detonite Injector
description: Detonite injectors are the basis for explosive and incendiary weapons.

name: Devar
description: A cloudy crystal.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Pyrol and Azurite being rarer than intended and Coprun and Devar being more likely than intended. They should now be equally as likely.

name: Eidolon Shard
description: Shard gained from the sentients roaming the Plains of Eidolon.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.18.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed seeing unowned Eidolon Shards in the ‘Focus Conversion’ screen.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.18.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Focus ‘Buy Capacity’ button not updating after converting Eidolon Shards into Focus.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.15.0
patchlogs.changes: A special UI message is now displayed when picking up Tellurium, or any of the Eidolon Shards (similar to Argon Crystal).

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.12.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Clients not being able to see/pick up the dropped Brilliant Eidolon Shard when a Host Migration occurred and no one had picked it up yet.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.10.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed UI locking up when attempting to do a Focus Conversion with Eidolon Shards.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.1.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue where Brilliant Eidolon Shards were not properly accounted for in the Focus Conversion screen after used to unlock Way-Bound nodes.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a UI issue that occurred upon spending Focus while also redeeming Brilliant Eidolon Shards for Focus.

name: Esher Devar
description: Polished and cut to perfection.

name: Exceptional Sentient Core
description: An integral part of Vomvalysts and Teralysts, the exact function of this... device? Organ? is uncertain.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.13.3
patchlogs.changes: Picking up a Syndicate Medallion, Exceptional Sentient Core, or Flawless Sentient Core will now display the same special UI message like when you pick up an Argon Crystal.

name: Ferros
description: A resilient metal that is hardened by the inpurities within it.

name: Fersteel Alloy
description: Ferros that has been forged into a stronger metal.

name: Fieldron
description: ClanTech weaponized containment field to contain super-heated substances.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.0.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue where the Dual Cestra project can be started before you ever start the Fieldron research. Every other item in the energy lab has prior requirements except for Dual Cestras.

name: Fieldron Sample
description: This destroyed Fieldron could further research into super-heated containment fields.

name: Flawless Sentient Core
description: An integral part of Vomvalysts and Teralysts, the exact function of this... device? Organ? is uncertain.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.13.3
patchlogs.changes: Picking up a Syndicate Medallion, Exceptional Sentient Core, or Flawless Sentient Core will now display the same special UI message like when you pick up an Argon Crystal.

name: Grokdrul
description: A noxious mix of polyssachharides and long-chain polymers, Grokdrul is a standard chemical used in Grineer manufacturing.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a mislabeled Grokdrul Injector.

name: Heart Nyth
description: Polished and cut to perfection.

name: Hemocyte Cystolith
description: Torn from the bile duct of a fallen Hemocyte.

name: Intact Sentient Core
description: An integral part of Vomvalysts and Teralysts, the exact function of this... device? Organ? is uncertain.

name: Iradite
description: A valuable mineral found on the Plains.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not being able to waypoint Iradite, Grokdul, or Maprico Trees in the Plains.

name: Kuaka Spinal Claw
description: The sinew from the Kuaka's spinal claws can be tanned to make a resilient and flexible leather.

name: Maprico
description: This hardy fruit is thick-skinned to withstand harsh conditions, concealing a mouthful of sweet pulp within.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not being able to waypoint Iradite, Grokdul, or Maprico Trees in the Plains.

name: Marquise Veridos
description: Polished and cut to perfection.

name: Mutagen Mass
description: This living mass can produce weaponized toxins for weaponry.

name: Mutagen Sample
description: These samples could advance our knowledge of biological research.

name: Nistlepod
description: Used by the Nistlebrush to trap and kill prey.

name: Nyth
description: A rare local Gem, formed when the gas known as Breath of the Eidolon becomes trapped in molten iradite.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.20.6
patchlogs.changes: Fixed a variety of bugs caused by using Transference while going through Sanctuary Onslaught Conduit (namely not being able to do anything or use Transference while controlling Operator).

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.18.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with Mirage's Hall of Mirror clone kills not counting towards anything.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.2.5
patchlogs.changes: Removed Lotus transmission from End of Mission screen when going from Plains back to Cetus when you haven't done anything.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Vazarin’s Protective Dash providing immunity and health, regardless of whether or not anything is hit. Only "allies hit by Void Dash" are meant to receive buff.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Update 21.7.0
patchlogs.changes: Overhauled all aspects of physics engine for general optimization. You shouldn't notice anything, but since we literally touched all aspects of physics we are hoping you can keep an eye out for odd new behavior.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.5.1
patchlogs.changes: Significantly shortened the time required to self-Revive from 3 seconds to 1 second. This is in an effort to make it a quick decision in the heat of battle. We don't want scenarios where teammates try to revive you as you choose to end it and are unsure why they can't do anything for 3 or more seconds.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.4.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed trying to use Mesa’s Waltz Peacemaker Conclave Augment causing you to get locked out of doing anything until Energy runs out or you die in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.2.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Chroma's Effigy sometimes not doing anything in Captura.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.6 + 18.0.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Partially fixed an unintended weapon appearing in a certain Clan research. It won't be accessible by any means until its intended release (soon TM). This fix is server-side, so you may still see evidence of its existence, you just won't be able to do anything with this.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.5.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed enemies not doing anything in Defense missions.

name: Pyrol
description: A tarnished, brittle metal.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Pyrol and Azurite being rarer than intended and Coprun and Devar being more likely than intended. They should now be equally as likely.

name: Pyrotic Alloy
description: Pyrol that has been forged into a stronger metal.

name: Radian Sentirum
description: Polished and cut to perfection.

name: Radiant Eidolon Shard
description: Rare shard gained from capturing the Sentients roaming the Plains of Eidolon. Use it to gain Focus or to unbind Way-bound focus nodes.

name: Sentirum
description: A rare Eidolon Gem, created from the fossilized blood of an ancient Sentient.

name: Star Crimzian
description: Polished and cut to perfection.

name: Tear Azurite
description: Polished and cut to perfection.

name: Veridos
description: A highly reflective, green gem.
